Database Engine ImplementationImplementation of a DB system. Includes in memory data representation, Query Execution and OptimizationArpit BhayaniSriram Patil
Share.doShare.do is a web application that is an event-action framework that enables user to share on various social websites by triggering an event on one of them. Currently integrated for facebook, twitter and Instagram.Arpit BhayaniSriram Patil
In-memory File System Implementation using FUSE ApiIn-memory file system provided all services that a regular file system does; the only difference is that it is in memory; All the meta information of the file is present in memory rather than on the secondary storage.Arpit Bhayani
Linux Shell InterpretorThis is the shell interpretor that is like the regular terminal that we see for linux. The project typically includes implementation ofArpit Bhayani
Generic workbench for Dynamic Program Analysis for CGeneric workbench for dynamic program analysis for C is a tool used to solve defects in C program like Memory Leakage Problem, Uninitialized Variable Detection using dynamic approach.Arpit BhayaniGaurav MuradeNikhil Devshatwar
Wall-TweakWall-Tweak is a linux utility tool which customizes desktop. This tool enables the user to have number of wallpapers which keeps changing over time.Arpit Bhayani
Tone-SayTone-Say is an android app that intersects incoming call and speaks out caller name before the ringtone. This app is easy to configure and very light weighted.Arpit Bhayani
Singing FingersSinging Fingers is an android app that blends Paint and Sound together. Application records the sound as we paint in the app and reproduces it different tempo when touched again. This application is one of its kind for android.Arpit Bhayani
AudioTouchAudioTouch is a prototype simulation made on Android Platform. It helps a blind kid to learn and understand Braille. The kid can hear the word or letter while he is touching it. This project prototype was made under the guidance of MIT,USA experts in the 1st Design and Innovation Workshop, India 2011.Arpit Bhayani
QuizzerQuizzer is a .NET PC application which creates and manages Quizzes. It was developed to take C-programming MCQ based quiz. This application is now an open source application distributed from COEPâ€™s server, used by over 10 colleges in Pune to conduct the C quiz in their colleges.
